column1: | of ernest stoessel. ernest a. stoessel of freeport on june 13
column2: 2015. retired teacher from the n. y. c. board of education. beloved husband of mary. loving father of maria (james) wilcox
column6: and andrew. dear grandfather of 9. family will receive friends on tuesday 2 4 & 7 9 pm. funeral mass wednesday 9:30 am our holy redeemer rc church. interment st charles cemetery.
